resources.string:
Overview
Mild Architect is an android application that provides simple and elegant architectural photography, and is carefully selected to provide beautiful images to be used as mobile wallpapers. consists of images with 4K resolution of buildings, bridges, skyscrapers etc.

Developer
Mild Architect - HD Architectural Wallpaper Collection
Try out this apps, its cool

All the wallpapers in this app are under common creative licenses and the credit goes to their owners. these images are not endorsed by any of the prospective owners, and the images are used simply for aesthetic purposes. no copyrght infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the images/logos/names will be honored. This is and unofficial application and we are not affiliated with, approved sponsored, or approved spesifically by any company.
Set and Download High Quality Wallpaper
Saved an image for further use to your collection.
Nice and simple to download and set image as wallpaper.
This app needs permission for storage to work.
